meanings.definition: Released or made available before the official release date.
meanings.sent1: The prereleased movie was shown to a select group of people before it came out in theaters.
meanings.sent2: The prereleased album was leaked online before the artist intended.
meanings.sent3: The prereleased video game caused excitement among fans who couldn't wait to play it.
meanings.sent4: The prereleased book created a buzz in the literary world before its official launch.
meanings.sent5: The prereleased product generated a lot of interest from customers eager to try it out.

meanings.definition: To release or make available before the official release date.
meanings.sent1: The company prereleased the new software to gather feedback from users.
meanings.sent2: They prereleased the movie to build anticipation among the audience.
meanings.sent3: The band prereleased their latest single as a surprise for their fans.
meanings.sent4: The author prereleased chapters of the novel to engage readers before the book's launch.
meanings.sent5: The game developer prereleased a demo version to tease players with the upcoming release.
